citation.article-title: Occurrence of novel verrucomicrobial species, endosymbiotic and associated with parthenogenesis in Xiphinema americanum-group species (Nematoda, Longidoridae)
citation.source: International Journal of Systematic and Evolutionary Microbiology

p.s: Description of 'Candidatus Xiphinematobacter rivesi' sp. nov.
Xiphinematobacter rivesi (ri.ve'si. N.L. gen. masc. n. rivesi of Rives, i.e. lives in the species Xiphinema rivesi)
Specific host is the nematode Xiphinema rivesi.
Closest relative is `Candidatus Xiphinematobacter americani' sp. nov., having a 16S rDNA sequence 3.15% distant.
16S rDNA sequence GenBank accession number: AF217461.
